(as of Nov 30,2022 11:13:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOOL DAILY

Tool Daily has accumulated abundant manufacturing experience in the past 20 years and possess our own factory.

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

Adjustable Snow Foam Lance with 1/4″ quick connection fitting. Container Capacity: 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon. Specification: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI.
EASY to install: fill some soap into the bottle with warm water to get thick foam; Then connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to Pressure Washer Gun or Wand. Finally, adjust the knob on the top to desired foam level and then foam sprayer will disperse thick foam. The knob adjusts the foam dispensing amount and the nozzle adjusts the sprinkle pattern.
Adjustable nozzle for accurate mixing and foam generation. Turn the top knob right (-) to get the thickest mixture, adjust the nozzle to get a proper sprinkle pattern, and let it loose.
5 Nozzle Tips have different angle (0, 15, 25, 40, 65 degree). Choose different nozzle according to the actual need. Such as watering flowers and plants, washing car. They also can be attached to a Quick-Connect Wand for swifter application and more.
Application: ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Tool Daily: The Great Brand for Pressure Washer Accessory

Tool Daily are committed to developing more efficient and safer pressure washer accessory, helping people reducing the tiredness of spraying and cleaning in the garden. We are known for amazing pressure washer accessory, such as nozzle, wand, gun, coupler, foam cannon.

Feature

  • Universal foam cannon with 1/4″ quick disconnection fits almost all pressure washer.
  • Adjustable foam cannon can mix cleaning fluid with water accurately and generate foam quickly.
  • The bottle can be filled in with 1 Liter cleaning fluid. Spray angle and suction amount of cleaning fluid can be adjusted according to needs.
  • It is used to wash motorcycle, car, roofs, driveways, siding, floors and windows.
  • Working Condition: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI
  • Max Temperature: 60℃ / 140℉.
  • Bottle Capacity: 1L.
  • PACKAGE INCLUDE
  • 1 X Foam cannon
  • 1 X Red Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (0 Degree)
  • 1 X Yellow Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (15 Degree)
  • 1 X Green Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (25 Degree)
  • 1 X White Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (40 Degree)
  • 1 X Brass soap nozzle tip (65 Degree)

Read more

How to Install Foam Cannon

Step 1. Fill some soap into the bottle with warm water. The foam cannon’s bottle is graduated and can hold 1000 ml.

Step 2. Connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to pressure washer gun or wand.

Step 3. Adjust the knob to desired foam level and then it disperses thick foam.

Read more

Ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Foam Cannon Bottle with Straw

Product Description

Smart watch with text and call

Women’s smart watch contains many daily useful tools. For example, Bluetooth calls, smart notifications, breath training, music control, camera control, do not disturb mode, stopwatch, weather, flashlight.

【Call Notifications & Dialing】Smart watches for women includes more practical functions, Fitness Tracker (Pedometer, Calories, Distance), Heart Rate Monitor, Blood Pressure, 8 Sports Modes, Sleep Monitor, Blood Oxygen , Call Notifications & Phone calls, SMS and APP Messages , Music and Camera Control, Brightness Adjustment, Weather Display, Sedentary Reminder, Alarm Clock, Stopwatch.
【 1.72″ HD IPS Screen 】Smart watch for android phones uses 2.5D full-touch 1.72-inch color screen with 240*285 high-definition resolution, which makes every data screen clear and flexible. The ultra-thin frame gives you a more open visual experience. Custom dial design, You can change your favorite picture as a watch face with one click .（Specially equipped with an additional pink silicone strap.）
【Accurate Activity Tracker Watch & 8 Sport Modes】Fitness watch for women compatible with iphone track your steps,calories,heart rate,sleep stages,Blood Pressure,oxygen;smart watch supports 8 sports modes:walking,running,bicycle,swimming ,badminton,basketball,football,rope skipping to give you more detailed insights into your whole day activities; IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when swimming and record various data (Can not wear in hot shower).
【SMART WATCH FOR ANDROID PHONES】Compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 5.1 & Bluetooth 4.0 above. Download and install the Free “DA FIT” APP, connecting this womens smart watch in your phone, you can receive notifications of the calendar, incoming calls, SNS (Messenger, WhatsApp, Skype, etc) and preview messages. It will never let you miss any important things( Can not reply message). We offer sincere service within 7 x 24hrs to meet your satisfaction.
【Super Long Battery Life 】Android smart watch for women men equipped with a 200 mAh large capacity battery and can be used 7-15 days If fully charge (depends on individual usage) smart watch with text and call

Women’s smart watch contains many daily useful tools. For example, Bluetooth calls, smart notifications, breath training, music control, camera control, do not disturb mode, stopwatch, weather, flashlight.

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand About VXSCAN Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ VXSCAN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B1QGP86W

【EVAP SMOKE MACHINE】VXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
【EASY TO USE】By heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
【SMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE】Equipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
【Air Mode & Smoke Mode】The V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
【WIDELY COMPATIBILITY】Our package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120℃, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20℃. You don’t have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

4.5
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

Customer Reviews

4.5 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #4,540 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#89 in Wheel & Tire Air Compressors & Inflators
Date First Available September 10, 2022

Price: $45.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:07 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Tire Inflator

Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor

【12V DC/110V AC Power Supply】YYTON air pump for car tires with a 12V car cigarette lighter plug as well as a wall plug for a 110V household socket, two ways of powering, ideal for indoor and travel use. We can use the wall plug when we are at home, and we can use the cigarette lighter car plug when we are outside, very convenient
【Strong Air Pressure for Quick inflation】The highest pressure of air compressor for car can reach 150ps. For car tire 195/60/R15 inflation from 0 to 36 PSI, it only takes about 4 minutes to complete the set pressure value. If multiple tires need to be inflated, we recommend allowing the air compressor to cool down for 5 minutes after 10 minutes of continuous operation
【Digital Display/Auto-Off】The portable air compressor with a large font digital display, four pressure units are available (psi, bar, kpa, kg/cm²), preset the value you want, when the preset pressure is reached , the device will automatically shut down, with this air compressor portable, you no longer have to worry about over-inflation affecting driving safety
【Long Cords and LED Lights】The DC and AC power cords for portable air compressors for car tires are 9.2 feet and 5.2 feet respectively, which is long enough to inflate anywhere you want, in addition, this tire inflation with LED light A portable air compressor can help you inflate or check your tires in low light conditions, making it easy for you to inflate your tires in the dark
【Multipurpose/Compact Design】The latest car air pump adopts a handle design, it is more convenient to carry, it is compact enough without taking up more space, the tire compressor is equipped with 4 kinds of nozzle adapters and 1 fuse, suitable for cars, mid-size SUVs, Bicycles, motorcycles, basketballs, air mattresses, swimming pool toys and other inflatable products. You can contact us at any time if you have any questions.

YYTON Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor Multifunctional Electric Pump

AC/DC Dual Stream Electric Air Pump

  • Voltage: household 110V/car 12V
  • Display unit: psi, bar, kpa, kg/cm²
  • Maximum air pressure: 150PSI
  • Automatic shutdown: yes
  • LED: 12 LED bulbs

Read more

Our Original Intention

With this tire inflator portable, we can save a lot of cost and physical strength every year, such as: when we go out, the tire is out of air, which makes us unable to reach the destination normally, saving us the time and money to go to the repair shop.Holidays can save us a lot of energy when using balloon decoration, including automatically inflating the swimming ring when swimming.

When you don’t know how much air pressure the inflatable device needs to inflate, you can set the maximum air pressure value to inflate. For example: a basketball swimming ring, you can set the air pressure to 149psi to inflate, and you can manually stop the inflation after it is full!

Bright LED lights

This air pump with emergency LED light will help you to check the safety of your tires in the dark night

Lightweight and compact

Easy to carry, our tire air compressor is not only small in design, but also has enough horsepower without taking up any space

AC/DC Two Power Modes

This portable tire inflator comes with two power cords (110V and 12V), making it easy to use on the road or indoors

Package Includes

1X Inflatable Host，1X Instructions，1x Fuse，1XAC Connector，1XDC Connector，3X Air Nozzle

Read more

4.5
Price: $45.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:07 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 29,2022 03:29:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

1 Heart Rate Monitor 2 BP & SpO2 Monitor 3 Sleep Tracking

1 Long Battery Life 2 How to Charge 3 IP67 Water Resistance

How to monitor your blood pressure and blood oxygen?

1. Set personal information in the App.

2. Wear the watch 1.5-2.5cm below the wrist bone.

3. Enter the monitoring mode and keep your arm stable.

4. Wait 10 ~15 seconds to show the data.

Note: the data cannot be used as a medical-grade test.

How to reconnect the smart watch with smartphones?

For iPhone: Remove Device ‘P22’ in the HeroBandIII App→Open ‘Settings’→Click ‘8luetooth’→Select ‘P22’→Click ‘（i）’ →Click ‘Forget This Device’→Reconnect the smart watch in App

For Android: Remove ‘P22’ in the App→Reconnect the smart watch in App

How to get message notifications on the watch if you do not allow the App to receive notifications when installing App?

1. For iOS: ‘Phone Settings’→Click ‘8luetooth’→’P22’→Turn on ‘Share System Notification’

For Android: Open App→’Notifications’→’Notification access’→Turn on ‘HeroBandIII’

2.Open ‘Phone Settings’→’Notification’→’HeroBandⅢ’→Turn on ‘Allow Notification’

How to reset time on the watch?

The watch time is synced with the connected smartphone.

If the watch time is wrong, please unbind with phone first.

Then follow the steps above to reconnect with smartphone to get the correct time.

How to track your steps correctly?

1. Set personal information correctly in the APP.

2. Wear the watch 1.5-2.5 cm below the wrist bone, and adjust the strap not too tightly or too loosely.

3. Let your arms swing naturally while walking.

Sleep and Blood Oxygen Saturation: The Tracker can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Pressure, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your deep, light sleep state which can help you better understand your health. (NOTE: the data cannot be used as a medical-grade test)
Notifications and More Practical Features: All messages and notifications will show on your wrist and remind you through vibration. It cannot answer call or text on watch. There are also many convenient functions like Timer, Wake-up Gesture, Find Phone, Sedentary Reminder, Music Control and Weather Display.
1.4 Inch Full-touch Screen & Custom Watch Face: The watch with 1.4 inch LCD screen can provide you with high-quality touch and visual experience. Five levels of brightness options allow you to easily read information in the sun or dark. Also you can choose a picture you like to customize the watch face on HeroBand III. (Wristband Size: 5.85 – 8.78 inch)
Great Battery Life and Wide Compatibility: Our smart watch is compatible with iOS 9.0/Android OS 4.4 or above smartphones. It can be used for up to 7 days and standby for 30+ days after fully charged.
